Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: CarePlanActivityKind
Title: Care Plan Activity Kind
Descriptino: Resource types defined as part of FHIR that can be represented as in-line definitions of a care plan activity.

Name: CarePlanActivityStatus
Title: CarePlanActivityStatus
Descriptino: Codes that reflect the current state of a care plan activity within its overall life cycle.

Name: PatientContactRelationship
Title: Patient Contact Relationship
Descriptino: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

Name: ProblemsSnomedAbsentUnknownUvIps
Title: Problems - SNOMED CT + Absent/Unknown - IPS
Descriptino: This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®:  descendants of 404684003 \|Clinical finding (finding) \|, descendants of 243796009 \|Situation with explicit context (situation)\| and descendants of 272379006 \|Event (event)\| but excludes descendants of 71388002 \|Procedure (procedure)\|, as they are expected to be represented separately in the History of Procedures Section.

Name: Austritt

Descriptino: Dokumentation des Grundes für den Austritt aus einem DMP

Name: Symptoms
